title: Red Kap Men's Relaxed Fit Jean
description: Pant label length may state 37U because items are cut to order

If you think happiness is a comfortable pair of jeans, just wait until you try ours! Made of durable, heavy-weight denim, these relaxed fit jeans grant you comfortable mobility with classic five pocket styling, much appreciated by automotive or warehouse workers. Made with a hard worker in mind, these denim work pants offer all the storage you could possible want, making them your go-to on work days.
